interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Follain Everybody Bar Soap | Lavender & Bergamot, Skin Moisturizing Hand & Body Cleanser with Shea Butter, Argan Oil, Hydrate for Softer Skin, Non-Drying, Rich-Lather, Cruelty Free, 5 oz Review Date: 2020/11/12 Store: Follain Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Brand': 'Follain', 'Scent': 'Bergamot,Lavender', 'Material Feature': 'Cru, Non GMO, Dermatologist Tested', 'Product Dimensions': '3.75 x 2.25 x 1 inches; 5.11 Ounces', 'Item model number': '692764483009', 'UPC': '692764483009'} Review Text: Nice, scented soap that should fulfill all your bathing needs. The price may be a bit higher than most soaps, but this is a more quality brand and far from generic as you can get.

Katiebabs Review Title: Nice, scented soap that should fulfill all your bathing needs (B+ Grade) Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------

Strixaderm Lash Advance Eyelash Conditioner - Hypo Allergenic Eyebrow Enhancer Serum & Primer Mascara For Natural Eye Brow Growth & Thick Long Lashes STRIXADERM-MD {'Package Dimensions': '4.4 x 1.4 x 1.3 inches; 0.81 Ounces', 'UPC': '096563380000'} Not a fan of this product because I was looking for something more like mascara. It doesn't fit my makeup needs in everyday life.

Katiebabs A Pass For Me (C Grade) Bouquet Garni Body Shower White Musk - Unique Fragrance Decanting Engineering Method gives Long Lasting Rich Fragrance - Gentle and Mild Cleansing Scented Body Wash with Natural Surfactant 17.85 Fl Oz Bouquet Garni {'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Skin Type': 'All, Dry', 'Brand': 'Bouquet Garni', 'Scent': 'Garni', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '8.23 x 6.34 x 3.66 inches; 1.34 Pounds'} If you like the scent of vanilla mixed in with soap, this body wash is for you. It creates a nice lather but it doesn't have that natural smell and more along the lines of chemical. But it does an okay job.

Katiebabs Soap and Vanilla Combined (B Grade) Follain Everybody Bar Soap | Lavender & Bergamot, Skin Moisturizing Hand & Body Cleanser with Shea Butter, Argan Oil, Hydrate for Softer Skin, Non-Drying, Rich-Lather, Cruelty Free, 5 oz Follain {'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Brand': 'Follain', 'Scent': 'Bergamot,Lavender', 'Material Feature': 'Cru, Non GMO, Dermatologist Tested', 'Product Dimensions': '3.75 x 2.25 x 1 inches; 5.11 Ounces', 'Item model number': '692764483009', 'UPC': '692764483009'} Nice, scented soap that should fulfill all your bathing needs. The price may be a bit higher than most soaps, but this is a more quality brand and far from generic as you can get.

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Makeup Preferences:** Prefers functional products that enhance everyday makeup routines, favoring traditional cosmetics like mascara over conditioning treatments.
- **Quality Expectations:** Values efficacy and performance, expressing strong dissatisfaction for underperforming products, particularly in skincare and body care.
- **Product Evaluation:** A critical reviewer with a discerning taste, known for providing low ratings to items that do not meet high expectations across all categories.
- **Focus on Results:** Seeks products that offer immediate visual impact and substantial benefits, emphasizing effective cleansing and body wash products for noticeable results.
- **Sensitivity to Marketing:** Holds high expectations influenced by marketing claims, leading to disappointment with products that do not perform as advertised. This reflects a desire for transparency and reliability in product descriptions.
- **Broader Preferences:** Recent interactions indicate a growing interest in body care items, specifically those with naturally derived ingredients and effective cleansing properties. The user appreciates scents that are not overly synthetic and is critical of chemical undertones in fragrances.

The latest review highlights the user’s preference for quality products, as evidenced by their positive experience with a moisturizing soap that balances effectiveness with scent, although they continue to maintain a critical viewpoint regarding pricing and overall value. This underscores their inclination towards effective and reliably performing products, while still prioritizing a discerning approach to beauty-related purchases.
